title: Those patch notes on Jarvan

replies.body: Are you shocked? There are now 3ish champions, in the jungle, that are better in the LCS right now. So we need to knock one down so Lee can get back up there...

> [{quoted}](name=Retillin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i38EVV6z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-24T21:51:03.563+0000)
>
> Are you shocked? There are now 3ish champions, in the jungle, that are better in the LCS right now. So we need to knock one down so Lee can get back up there...

I'm not shocked. I'm actually surprised with new creative ways they show their favoritism. "All these things that make Lee problematic for 4 seasons? We'll use them as a reason to nerf Jarvan after being ~~top~~ Lee tier for a few patches."
Oh, get off your cross. There are way more viable junglers than just Jarvan and Lee Sin.

> [{quoted}](name=Ulquiorra995,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i38EVV6z,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-24T21:42:38.371+0000)
>
> "Unlike his other Warrior-enchant-toting brethren, J4's **incredible gank pressure, clear speed and safety make him a threat throughout the game with no real weaknesses for opponents to exploit."**
> 
> 
> Yeah, a single champion should not have great gank pressure, clears and safety without a meaningful weakness to exploit. Glad we all agree on that.
> {{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}{{champion:64}}

yes because dodging a lee q is similar to "dodging" a chilling smite by a j4 and then a guaranteed eq combo which even if u manage to dodge or surivve will be followed with his ulti. yup lee has that much pressure. who knew that a laner without flash was a sure kill by lee compared to j4s "weak" ganks.

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Lee Sin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i38EVV6z,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-25T01:03:24.988+0000)
>
> yes because dodging a lee q is similar to "dodging" a chilling smite by a j4 and then a guaranteed eq combo which even if u manage to dodge or surivve will be followed with his ulti. yup lee has that much pressure. who knew that a laner without flash was a sure kill by lee compared to j4s "weak" ganks.

As oppose to Lee Sin, Chilling smite, then Q, LITERALLY walk in front of the person, then R him back into your team for a good as guaranteed death? They're both strong, no denying that, point is exactly what the poster is saying though, of course Jarvan gets nerfed before Lee Sin.

> [{quoted}](name=Droogzy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i38EVV6z,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-02-25T02:14:27.359+0000)
>
> As oppose to Lee Sin, Chilling smite, then Q, LITERALLY walk in front of the person, then R him back into your team for a good as guaranteed death? They're both strong, no denying that, point is exactly what the poster is saying though, of course Jarvan gets nerfed before Lee Sin.

which takes 10 times longer and allows for your champ to use some sort of skill that ccs him. getting ganked by j4 and u have no flash is 100 percent a death. lee sin is 10 times harder than j4 and thats why j4 got nerfed first.

Aren't you cute, running around the forums singing the praises of Lee Sin.
And if anyone argues it? Then they must be bronze noobs! You really should at least attempt to play Ranked before passing such judgement.
Lee Sin is just overloaded, simple as that, he has been for years and has strangled out most of the competition for years. If they can compete, they get nerfed like that.

> [{quoted}](name=OperationDEEZ1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i38EVV6z,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-26T05:21:32.581+0000)
>
> Aren't you cute, running around the forums singing the praises of Lee Sin.
> And if anyone argues it? Then they must be bronze noobs! You really should at least attempt to play Ranked before passing such judgement.
> Lee Sin is just overloaded, simple as that, he has been for years and has strangled out most of the competition for years. If they can compete, they get nerfed like that.

I don't play league anymore because people like you exist , once they do nerf lee I'll come back, shit down everyone's throats then wait for u to start complaining again, it's a nice cycle. I did the same thing last season and it proved my point that you people can not stop complaining .

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Lee Sin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i38EVV6z,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-25T01:03:24.988+0000)
>
> yes because dodging a lee q is similar to "dodging" a chilling smite by a j4 and then a guaranteed eq combo which even if u manage to dodge or surivve will be followed with his ulti. yup lee has that much pressure. who knew that a laner without flash was a sure kill by lee compared to j4s "weak" ganks.

LOLOLOLLOLOL NICE FKING IGN, LEE SIN MAIN.
As if lee sin couldn't chilling smite u also, q u to the face with a 160% bonus AD ratio (in total), use E for another 100%, and a strong ass slow, and then kick you in the face for 400+ base dmg with 200% bonus AD. Can also insec or flash kick for more utility. You aint escaping from 2 gap closers, strong slow, and a kick.

Same thing as the post i made about kassadin and Zed.
Now it's basically rito making leesin feel innocent
I'm trying to make the Lee Sin face but #lcsbigplays doesn't work?
